About Me

I am pursuing my bachelor's in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and at Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering. I have a lot of enthusiasm for Artificial intelligence and Data Science. I'm highly interested in working as an intern in these fields.I had the chance to work as an AI intern at Inventrom Pvt. Ltd. while I was pursuing my degree. I have worked on multiple projects like Anti- Procastination Specs, AI Custom recipe maker, Youtube clone, etc. Along with my technical abilities, I also possess:
